GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The road <clr:0000>north <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>Hebra Mountains<clr:ffff> is
awful steep—stock up at a <clr:0000>stable <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>Rito
Village<clr:ffff> so you're ice and prepared!
Greeting:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:5:1:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Achoo!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_01>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>Pardon.<sp:5:1:0> The cold snap might be over,
but it's still so chilly down here.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sure is cold out here! Head east if you
need to defrost.

If you feel like you're about to fall over,
you can take refuge in a <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You might think you've found a <clr:0000>deserted
house<clr:ffff>, and then find a bunch of <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff>
inside. Stay frosty!
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>Heya, kiddums! Made your way out of the
stable, have you? 

With temperatures this low, you've gotta
be prepared. Safety frost!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Listen up, kiddums! Here's some free
advice! <clr:0000>Caves <clr:ffff>aside, this <clr:0000>stable <clr:ffff>is just
about the only place around to get warm.<sp:5:0:0>
Be careful out there. Make whatever
preparations you have to.

Or if this isn't the chill you want to
die on, head east!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Visibility's so good out there, you'll be the
star of the snow. Keep your guard up!
After all...once bitten, ice shy!
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sometimes, <clr:0000>deserted houses <clr:ffff>only LOOK
deserted—and then you find <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff>
chilling inside.
Keep your head up, kiddums!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wow, thanks for saving me! This area's
sure lousy with monsters these days.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>Phew, I thought that was it for me!<sp:5:0:0>
I'm glad you came, kiddums.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Work_01>Underestimating the weather is a serious
snow pas!<sp:0:4:0>You can stave off the cold by warming up
at a <clr:0000>fire <clr:ffff>or holing up in a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>.

But cold isn't the only danger in these
parts—some of these <clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>are stuffed
with monsters!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hold on, kiddums! If you're heading <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>
to the <clr:0000>Hebra Mountains<clr:ffff>, you've got a
steep trek ahead.
Stock up at a <clr:0000>stable <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff> so
you're ice and prepared!
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you ever tried rolling a <clr:0000>snowball <clr:ffff>into
a monster?

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Fighting monsters isn't usually what puts
a smile on my face, but if you go with the
snow, you can really have a ball!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Fighting's just not for me. Imagine if we
were at peace... What an ice dream, eh?
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ah! That was close! I was on thin ice for
a minute there.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Visibility is a little toooo good around
here, so when you're outside, you're
the star of the snow.
Don't drop your guard out there—the
monsters sure won't!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I thought I had a snowball's chance in
summer of making it out alive! Thanks for
your help, kiddums!
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Making a big ol' <clr:0000>snowball <clr:ffff>and rolling it
into monsters can be tough. Remember—
just go with the snow!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Keep a weather eye out for monsters if
you hole up in a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>. A little care is a
small ice to pay!
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Good timing! Now give 'em the
cold one-two!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseL_01>What in the tundra?! Not even a big ol'
snowball has a chance against that!
Atacked01: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>What timing! I owe you one, kiddums!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm mighty grateful you came through
for me. <sp:5:0:0>In fact, here's a small token of
my thanks.
Take it! You're too young to be
modest, kiddums.
